description:
At Manami`s suggestion, everyone is invited to Kyousuke`s new apartment for a moving-in party. All of Kyousuke`s usual friends are gathering at his new place on the day of the party when Kirino arrives and she`s forced to confront Manami...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ange Ayase n`est pas censée descendre dans le studio où je vis seul
Maji Tenshisugiru Ayase-tan ga Hitorigurashi no Orenchi ni Kourin Suru Wake ga Nai
Total Angel Ayase-tan Can`t Descend Upon My Place While I Live Alone
マジ天使すぎるあやせたんが一人暮らしの俺んちに降臨するわけがない
